summary: The diff implements a new Mod Menu page with mod toggles, multipliers, status bar, rainbow background CSS, backend-aligned mod settings types/APIs (plus a migration), and UI panels for item and prefab spawning. However, the required generated cover image asset is not evidenced as added, and the prefab catalog asset is referenced in summaries but not evidenced in the diff’s added files list. Several extra (non-requested) features/branding files also appear to have been added/changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a “Cactus Cowboy: Plants at War” cover image as a generated static asset under frontend/public/assets/generated and render it on the Mod Menu page with responsive styling and English alt text.
missing_requirements.reason: The Mod Menu page references the cover image path, but the diff summary does not show the required static asset being added under frontend/public/assets/generated (only 3 files were added, and none are the image).
evidence: File diff summary header: "Added: 3" (no frontend/public/assets/generated/* image listed)

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a Prefab Spawner using a prefab list/catalog “from the game” with search/filter, allowing add-to-list and/or spawn, persisting chosen prefabs per user.
missing_requirements.reason: The UI panel and hooks reference loading a static prefab catalog JSON from public assets, but the diff summary does not evidence that the prefab catalog asset itself was added/modified (only 3 files added, none are the JSON). If the catalog file did not already exist, the prefab list requirement would not be fully implemented end-to-end.
evidence: File diff summary header: "Added: 3" (no frontend/public/assets/prefabs/*.json listed)

hallucinated_features.description: Downloads/APK distribution guidance panel and related APK README assets.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested in any REQ; BuildRequest is focused on mod menu UI, persistence, process selector, spawners, rainbow background, and cover image.

hallucinated_features.description: PWA/branding updates such as manifest changes beyond what was requested.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest does not request PWA manifest updates; only requires a cover image and mod menu UI/features.

hallucinated_features.description: Use of an additional mascot image in the profile setup dialog (cactus-cowboy-mascot.dim_768x768.png).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only specifies the Plants at War cover image asset; mascot image is not requested.
